text:
"Monsters at Work" is an upcoming American computer-animated streaming television series. It is a spin-off of the "Monsters, Inc." franchise, as well as a direct sequel to "Monsters, Inc." (2001). It will be the third television series based on properties by Pixar, after "Buzz Lightyear of Star Command" and "Forky Asks a Question"; as well as making "Monsters, Inc." the second Pixar franchise to spawn its own series.
The series is scheduled to debut on Disney+ in early 2021.
